Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback is {RTP}.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game.

landscape.text1: Match Your Numbers to Lucky Numbers and win a prize.
landscape.text2: {img} Reveal a Star symbol for an Instant Win.
landscape.text3: {img} A 2x Star symbol will double the prize.

portrait.text1: Match Your Numbers to Lucky Numbers and win a prize.
portrait.text2: Reveal a Star symbol for an Instant Win. A 2x Star symbol will double the prize.
portrait.text3: Reveal a Wheel Bonus symbol to trigger the Wheel Bonus.
portrait.text4: Reveal the Prize Bonus symbol to trigger the Prize Bonus

landscape.text1: {img} Reveal a Wheel Bonus symbol to trigger the Wheel Bonus
landscape.text2:
WHEEL BONUS - Spin the wheel to begin the bonus game. The inner wheel will reveal
your prize and the outer wheel will reveal how much that prize is multiplied by!

portrait.text1:
WHEEL BONUS - Spin the wheel to begin the bonus game. The inner wheel will reveal
your prize and the outer wheel will reveal how much that prize is multiplied by!

landscape.text1: {img} Reveal the Prize Bonus symbol to trigger the Prize Bonus
landscape.text2:
PRIZE BONUS - Select the gold bars to reveal prizes. Prizes accumulate in Prize Total.
Reveal gold coins to end the bonus and collect your prize!

portrait.text1:
PRIZE BONUS - Select the gold bars to reveal prizes. Prizes accumulate in Prize Total.
Reveal gold coins to end the bonus and collect your prize!

Game.bonusInfo: FIND 3 OR MORE GOLD STARS TO WIN!
Game.collectBonusInfo:
REVEAL GOLD COINS
TO END THE BONUS &
COLLECT YOUR PRIZE!
